tasks.label: Python: CodeSonar analyze
command: codesonar analyze numpy -hubuser ${config:codesonar.hubUser} -auth certificate -name ${input:codesonarAnalysisName} -conf-file codesonar.conf -project OSS-Projects/numpy-GitHub/developers/${config:codesonar.hubUser}  ${config:codesonar.hubAddress} codesonar python_scan.py -include-sources \B
